title: Fermion states localized on a self-gravitating non-Abelian monopole
abstract: We study fermionic modes localized on the static spherically symmetric self-gravitating non-Abelian monopole in the $SU(2)$ Einstein-Dirac-Yang-Mills-Higgs theory. We consider dependence of the spectral flow on the effective gravitational coupling constant and show that, in the limiting case of transition to the Reissner-Nordstr√∂m black hole, the fermion modes are fully absorbed into the interior of the black hole.
